t: Magik & Kover Pack and Play Mattresses Recalled Due to Suffocation Hazard for Infants; Violations of the Federal Safety Regulation for Crib Mattresses; Sold Exclusively on Amazon.com by Magik & Kover (Recall Alert) | CPSC.gov
s: Consumers should immediately stop using and destroy the recalled mattresses, and contact Magik & Kover to receive a full refund and for directions on how to dispose of the mattress. Magik & Kover and Amazon are contacting all purchasers directly.
